dynamicScan.title: Dynamic Scan
dynamicScan.warning: Make sure you perform all the actions in the App, there are high chances that the scanner might mark the risk as passed
dynamicScan.apiScanDescription: During dynamic scan network traffic made by the app, filtered by the below provided API endpoints will be recorded. Currently traffic capturing is not supported for the apps that employ SSL pinning.

apiScan.title: API Scan
apiScan.description: We will run API scan for web vulnerabilities on the below list of requests captured during the dynamic scan.
apiScan.warning: API scan performs multiple automated tests that may result in denial of service or loss of data. Do not proceed if the app is configured to use a production API server.
apiScan.noDynamicScan: Please run dynamic scan with API URL filters set. That will capture APIs required for the API scan

devicePreference.title: デバイスの設定変更
devicePreference.note: changing the device preference won't affect the already running scan.

manual.title: 手動診断をリクエストする

manual.appEnv: アプリケーション環境
manual.enterMinOSVersion: OSの最小バージョンを入力してください
manual.appQuestion1: 一部の機能にアクセスできない、またはアプリケーションに公開されていない機能がある場合は、どうしたらいいですか？
manual.appQuestion1Answer1: 再診断を実施しますので、診断を続行し、診断されなかった機能についてレポートで報告してください。
manual.appQuestion1Answer2: 診断を停止して、サポートに連絡してください。
